casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Hemant R. BORKAR. No. 502P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 16, 2005. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Hemant R. Borkar. *679Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of September 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed pending determination of the State's petition for discretionary review by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of September 2005."
